idea:
We are an EdTech start-up that has been set up by seasoned academicians, consultants and entrepreneurs who have a passion for business innovation.

We focus on increasing the chances of success by blending management practices with a design mindset and collaborative methods.

We have set up a virtual innovation laboratory based infrastructure and provide the following services to:

• Academia Schools of Learning

• Corporates and Businesses

• Government Institutions and Programs

• Non-Government Organisations

• Business Ventures and Teams

• Early Stage Start UPs


Overall We provide:

• Educational Courses and Programs

• Coaching & Mentoring Services

• Consulting Services in Technology, Management and People Development

• Research and Content Development Services

• Technology Development

• Product and Service Development


We do both 100% Virtual and blended delivery.
name: BUSINESS DESIGN LAB PRIVATE LIMITED

idea:
To offer programmatic digital media buying services to businesses and organisations in India.

The Programmatic India platform enables businesses to identify, visualize, and reach the right audience with class-leading capabilities in audience data, targeting (25,000+ audience segments and hyperlocal custom segmentation ability), buying efficiency and speed.

Programmatic India is the only Indian start-up that offers a very differentiated offering that does not currently exist in the marketplace.

Along with full transparency, ability to completely manage all aspects of digital media buying and comprehensive analytics makes Programmatic India a unique Indian start-up in the digital marketing space.
name: PROGRAMMATIC INDIA TECHNOLOGIES PRIVATE LIMITED

idea: Sharing spare space for warehousing. A platform to connect people who want to temporarily store their goods and those who have spare space.
name: Warer

idea:
